en.title: Islamic Guidance - Beginner's Guide for New Muslims

hero.title: Welcome to Islam

features.title: Simple and Clear
features.description: We explain complex topics in simple and understandable language. Content specially prepared for new Muslims.

features.description: All our information is compiled from reliable Islamic sources based on the Quran and Sunnah.
